post.description: For Amazon profiles, use **multipart/form-data** to upload certificate (.crt) and privateKey (.pem) files. The private key **must** be in PKCS#8 format (BEGIN PRIVATE KEY or BEGIN ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY). Traditional RSA format (BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY) is **not supported** - convert using: `openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -in old.pem -out new.pem`. For other profiles (Microsoft, LinTO), use application/json.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: uuid string identifier for an organization

config.description: JSON string containing the profile configuration. For Amazon: {"type":"amazon","name":"...","description":"...","languages":[{"candidate":"en-US"}],"region":"us-east-1","trustAnchorArn":"arn:aws:...","profileArn":"arn:aws:...","roleArn":"arn:aws:..."}. Optional: add "passphrase":"..." if private key is encrypted.

certificate.description: Certificate file (.crt) signed by your CA - required for Amazon profiles only. Click 'Choose File' to select your certificate file.

privateKey.description: Private key file (.pem) in PKCS#8 format - required for Amazon profiles only. Click 'Choose File' to select your key file. IMPORTANT: Key must start with '-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----' or '-----BEGIN ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY-----'. If your key starts with '-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----', convert it first: openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -in old.pem -out new.pem

put.summary: Update a transcriber config by ID (partial update)
put.description: Updates a transcriber profile with partial data. Only fields provided in the request body will be updated. The config field is merged with the existing configuration. For Amazon profiles, use **multipart/form-data** to update certificate (.crt) and/or privateKey (.pem) files. Private keys **must** be in PKCS#8 format - convert if needed: `openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -in old.pem -out new.pem`.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: uuid string identifier for an organization

config.description: JSON string containing the partial profile configuration to update. Only specified fields will be modified.

certificate.description: New certificate file (.crt) for Amazon profiles (optional). Click 'Choose File' to replace the existing certificate.

privateKey.description: New private key file (.pem) in PKCS#8 format for Amazon profiles (optional). Click 'Choose File' to replace the existing key. Must start with '-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----' or '-----BEGIN ENCRYPTED PRIVATE KEY-----'.
